item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to my personal blog. I intend to write and share my thoughts on technology, software engineering, and anything that comes to mind. Author I’m Xuebing (pronounced as shoe-bing). I am a senior software engineer at Zendesk, a customer relationship software company headquartered in San Francisco, where I build fault-tolerant distributed systems at scale. Currently, I work on high-throughput low-latency streaming platform using Scala, Apache Kafka, Kubernetes, and Amazon Web Services (AWS).

item.title: Hello World
item.description: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
